results.title: Perigord cuisine
results.creator_credit: Regis Dervelle and BCD France - TV Ontario Canada
results.brief_description: Provides an overview of the cuisine of the Perigord region in France. Shows the harvesting of the food items used as ingredients. Presents a demostration on how to cook some dishes from the region including scrambled eggs with truffles, truffle feullette, and mousse de foie gras covered with ham and flaky pastry.

results.title: Perhaps, perhaps, perhaps
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This work describes a young boy’s curiosity as to what lies behind a door that he is barred from. All kinds of things occur in his imagination as to what he thinks is behind the door. Finally, he plucks up the courage to open the door…and what does he see…??

results.title: Perhaps you've noticed you're changing
results.brief_description: Dicusses the bodily changes that occur in females at puberty. Uses computer graphics to explain the functions of the reproductive organs and the menstrual process. Also indicates the changes that occur in boys at puberty and illustrates, by a diagram, how conception occurs. Contains some low key comercial promotion.

results.title: Pergolas
results.creator_credit: Rod Parker and Do It Yourself Videos
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Do It Yourself Home Video Workshop. Series 1”.
Instructional video which shows how to build a pergola with professional results. After the desired location is determined the viewer is instructed how to measure and design the pergola and what council permits may be required. Timber, hardware and tool requirements are discussed before a step-by-step demonstration of preparation and construction techniques.

results.title: Perfumes of France
results.brief_description: The famous perfume of France, from flower to bottle. The cultivation of flower around Grasse in the south of France and the extraction of the essential oils; blending and testing of new perfumes; bottling and marketing the great perfumes.

results.title: Performing
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Job Catch”.
This film demonstrates ways in which an applicant can take a more positive role in a job interview by gaining a thorough understanding of the job interview process, thereby ensuring a more confident and relaxed attitude. Methods of utilising information on the nature of the job, and the work operations of the company or organisation are discussed, together with ways of improving performance in the job interview.

results.title: Performance appraisal: the human dynamics
results.brief_description: This film looks at the performance appraisal in everyday situations, including work. Dr. Alex Rosen, a specialist in organisational performance appraisal talks about the subject and sites that a number of organizations have experimented with a variety of performance appraisal systems, in an attempt to make a valuation of work performance a more productive experience.

results.title: Performance appraisal and personal development
results.brief_description: The principal aim of this video is to provide viewers with the knowledge and understanding of a performance appraisal system, the need for a positive and active role in the process and how the system will develop their performance and career prospects within an organisation. A manual accompanies this video and may be borrowed as a separate loan item.

results.title: Performance appraisal
results.creator_credit: Don Sykes, Kaiser Aluminum and Chemical Corporation and Stephen Bosustow Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Management by objectives and performance appraisal”.
An industrial education film which uses animation to review all the steps for successful and beneficial performance appraisal, including the gathering of facts, discussion of concrete, measurable objectives, and actual performance, and development of future work goals an plans. With leader’s guide.
